# JSON codec - Archaeological artifacts

## Test: Single item

```json
{
  "name": "Rosetta Stone",
  "origin": "Egypt",
  "yearDiscovered": 1799
}
```

---

## Test: Mesopotamian tablet

```json
{
  "name": "Epic of Gilgamesh tablet",
  "origin": "Mesopotamia",
  "yearDiscovered": 1853
}
```

---

## Test: Prehistoric tools

```json
{
  "name": "Oldowan stone tools",
  "origin": "East Africa",
  "yearDiscovered": 1931
}
```
# JSON codec - Ancient civilizations

## Test: Sumer

```json
{
  "name": "Sumer",
  "period": "4500-1900 BCE",
  "region": "Mesopotamia"
}
```

---

## Test: Ancient Egypt

```json
{
  "name": "Ancient Egypt",
  "period": "3100-30 BCE",
  "region": "Nile Valley"
}
```
